Johnson / HBO ) There's nothing like the anticipation, expectation and dread that surrounds the finale of a beloved TV series. This year, three long - running shows — New Girl, The Middle and The Americans — said goodbye with three satisfying finales. But that's not always the case. Sometimes, no matter how much you love what came before, a series can miss on its last swing, leaving a bitter taste for years to come. We've
